name: Next.js GCS Resumable Upload Init
description: Create a GCS resumable upload session URL.

files.template:
import { Storage } from '@google-cloud/storage';
export async function GET(){ const storage = new Storage(); const [url] = await storage.bucket(process.env.GCS_BUCKET!).file('big.bin').createResumableUpload({ origin:'*' }); return Response.json({ url }); }
